poem:
### The Leather Screen

In basement shadows dance,  
the gimp whispers unspoken consent.  
The leather shines, a tailored romance  
between tension and laughter—an ascent.  
Fire kindles in silence, deep  
where promises keep.  
In the absence of words,  
a shimmering script of unheard chords.
